title: Tom Brady, Colts, Conor McGregor, Baker Mayfield, and the Blazing 5
itunes:title: Tom Brady, Colts, Conor McGregor, Baker Mayfield, and the Blazing 5
description:
Colin talks about a Tom Brady stat that the New England Patriots QB should get more credit for, the problems with the Indianapolis Colts, what to expect from Cleveland Browns QB Baker Mayfield this weekend, why he's picking Conor McGregor to win at UFC 229, and his Blazing 5 picks. Guests include Albert Breer, Ben Volin, Ty Law, and Jason McIntyre.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
